mapper.sql: id, op_u_id AS opUId, op_user_name AS opUserName, ship_id AS shipId, ship_name AS shipName, imo, ship_type AS shipType, inspection_type AS inspectionType, port_id AS portId, port_name AS portName, start_date AS startDate, end_date AS endDate, current_quantity AS currentQuantity, current_quantity_url AS currentQuantityUrl, bonus_plan AS bonusPlan, total_price AS totalPrice, quotation_status AS quotationStatus, delivery_by AS deliveryBy, accepted_by AS acceptedBy , re_delivery_by AS reDeliveryBy, re_accepted_by AS reAcceptedBy, charter, owner, ship_particulars AS shipParticulars,ship_particulars_url AS shipParticularsUrl, port_agency AS portAgency, blank_loi_url AS blankLoiUrl, surveyor_u_id AS surveyorUId, create_date AS createDate, create_by AS createBy, update_date AS updateDate, update_by AS updateBy, del_flag AS delFlag, surveyorUId AS surveyor_u_id, estimateDate AS estimate_date
mapper.select: SELECT q.* FROM t_quotation q WHERE q.id=#{id} AND q.del_flag=0

SELECT quo.*,#{surveyorUId} AS u_id,1 AS `type` FROM t_quotation quo WHERE /*quo.end_date >=(select date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')) and*/ quo.quotation_status !=0 and quo.del_flag=0 and (quo.surveyor_u_id is null or quo.surveyor_u_id =#{surveyorUId}) and find_in_set(#{surveyorUId},quo.surveyor_u_ids) ORDER BY quo.update_date desc limit #{start},#{length}

select * from t_quotation q where q.id not in (select qa.quotation_id from t_quotation_application qa where qa.user_id=#{surveyorUId} and qa.quotation_id is not null) and q.quotation_status =1 and (q.surveyor_u_id is null or q.surveyor_u_id=#{surveyorUId} ) /*and q.end_date>=(select DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d'))*/ and find_in_set(#{surveyorUId},q.surveyor_u_ids) ORDER BY q.update_date desc limit #{start},#{length};
